org.drip.measure.lebesgue

Class RdUniform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.continuous.Rd
      • org.drip.measure.lebesgue.RdUniform

  • public class RdUniform
extends Rd
    RdUniform implements the R^d Lebesgue Measure Distribution that corresponds to a Uniform R^d d-Volume Space.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
